blocks.name: rege1logbrege0
blocks.content: The general logarithm, with a real base greater than 1, for a real number greater than or equal to 1 is greater than or equal to 0. (Contributed by AV, 25-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm rege1logbrege0(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(nat1, cioo, cpnf)), wcel(c1, co(nat1, cico, cpnf))), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, clogb, c1)))
} = {
  breqtrrd(nat0, cle, co(c0, clogb, c1), co(cfv(clog, c1), cdiv, cfv(clog, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, co(nat1, cioo, cpnf)), wcel(c1, co(nat1, cico, cpnf))))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, co(nat1, cioo, cpnf)), wcel(c1, co(nat1, cico, cpnf))), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(clog, c1), cdiv, cfv(clog, c0))), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(clog, c1)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, co(nat1, cioo, cpnf)), wcel(c1, co(nat1, cico, cpnf))), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(clog, c1)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat1, cle, c1)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, co(nat1, cioo, cpnf)), wcel(c1, co(nat1, cico, cpnf)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat1, cle, c1)))
  sylbi(wcel(c1, co(nat1, cico, cpnf)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat1, cle, c1)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat1, cle, c1)))
  id(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat1, cle, c1)))
  logge0(c1)
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, co(nat1, cioo, cpnf)), wcel(c1, co(nat1, cico, cpnf))), wb(wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(clog, c1)), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(clog, c1), cdiv, cfv(clog, c0)))), wcel(cfv(clog, c1), cr), wcel(cfv(clog, c0), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(clog, c0)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, co(nat1, cioo, cpnf)), wcel(c1, co(nat1, cico, cpnf)), wcel(cfv(clog, c1), cr))
  relogcld(c1, wcel(c1, co(nat1, cico, cpnf)))
  sylbi(wcel(c1, co(nat1, cico, cpnf)), wcel(c1, crp), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat1, cle, c1)))
  elrpd(c1, wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat1, cle, c1)))
  simpl(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat1, cle, c1))
  adantr(wcel(c0, co(nat1, cioo, cpnf)), wcel(c1, co(nat1, cico, cpnf)), wcel(cfv(clog, c0), cr))
  relogcld(c0, wcel(c0, co(nat1, cioo, cpnf)))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, co(nat1, cioo, cpnf)), wcel(c0, crp), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)))
  elrpd(c0, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, co(nat1, cioo, cpnf)), wcel(c1, co(nat1, cico, cpnf)), wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(clog, c0)))
  regt1loggt0(c0)
  ge0div(cfv(clog, c1), cfv(clog, c0))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, co(nat1, cioo, cpnf)), wcel(c1, co(nat1, cico, cpnf)), wceq(co(c0, clogb, c1), co(cfv(clog, c1), cdiv, cfv(clog, c0))), wcel(c0, cdif(cc, cpr(nat0, nat1))), wcel(c1, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))
  3imtr4i(wcel(c0, co(nat1, cioo, cpnf)), wcel(c0, cdif(cc, cpr(nat0, nat1))), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wne(c0, nat1)))
  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)), wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wne(c0, nat1))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wcel(c0, cc))
  recn(c0)
  gt0ne0d(c0, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)))
  imp(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, c0))
  mpani(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, nat1))
  syl3anc(wcel(c0, cr), wi(wa(wbr(nat0, clt, nat1), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(nat1, cr), wcel(c0, cr))
  0red(wcel(c0, cr))
  lttr(nat0, nat1, c0)
  simplbda(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wne(c0, nat1), wbr(nat1, cle, c0))
  ltlend(nat1, c0, wcel(c0, cr))
  1red(wcel(c0, cr))
  id(wcel(c0, cr))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(c0, co(nat1, cioo, cpnf)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0))), wcel(nat1, cxr))
  1xr()
  elioopnf(nat1, c0)
  eldifpr(c0, cc, nat0, nat1)
  3imtr4i(wcel(c1, co(nat1, cico, cpnf)), wcel(c1, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat1, cle, c1)), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)))
  jca(wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat1, cle, c1)), wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0))
  adantr(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat1, cle, c1), wcel(c1, cc))
  recn(c1)
  gt0ne0d(c1, wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat1, cle, c1)))
  imp(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat1, cle, c1), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))
  mpani(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat1, cle, c1), wbr(nat0, clt, c1), wbr(nat0, clt, nat1))
  0lt1()
  syl3anc(wcel(c1, cr), wi(wa(wbr(nat0, clt, nat1), wbr(nat1, cle, c1)), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(nat1, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  0red(wcel(c1, cr))
  1red(wcel(c1, cr))
  id(wcel(c1, cr))
  ltletr(nat0, nat1, c1)
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(c1, co(nat1, cico, cpnf)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat1, cle, c1))), wcel(nat1, cr))
  1re()
  elicopnf(nat1, c1)
  eldifsn(c1, cc, nat0)
  logbval(c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: rege1logbzge0
blocks.content: The general logarithm, with an integer base greater than 1, for a real number greater than or equal to 1 is greater than or equal to 0. (Contributed by AV, 25-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm rege1logbzge0(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, co(nat1, cico, cpnf))), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, clogb, c1)))
} = {
  sylan(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, co(nat1, cico, cpnf)), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, clogb, c1)), wcel(c0, co(nat1, cioo, cpnf)))
  3imtr4i(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c0, co(nat1, cioo, cpnf)), w3a(wcel(nat2, cz), wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat2, cle, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)))
  jca(w3a(wcel(nat2, cz), wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat2, cle, c0)), wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(nat2, cz), wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat2, cle, c0), wcel(c0, cr))
  3impia(wcel(nat2, cz), wcel(c0, cz), wbr(nat2, cle, c0), wbr(nat1, clt, c0))
  mpani(wa(wcel(nat2, cz), wcel(c0, cz)), wbr(nat2, cle, c0), wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wbr(nat1, clt, nat2))
  1lt2()
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(nat2, cz), wcel(c0, cz)), wi(wa(wbr(nat1, clt, nat2), wbr(nat2, cle, c0)), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)), wcel(nat1, cr), wcel(nat2, cr), wcel(c0, cr))
  a1i(wa(wcel(nat2, cz), wcel(c0, cz)), wcel(nat1, cr))
  1re()
  a1i(wa(wcel(nat2, cz), wcel(c0, cz)), wcel(nat2, cr))
  2re()
  adantl(wcel(nat2, cz), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c0, cr))
  zre(c0)
  ltletr(nat1, nat2, c0)
  eluz2(c0, nat2)
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(c0, co(nat1, cioo, cpnf)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat1, clt, c0))), wcel(nat1, cxr))
  1xr()
  elioopnf(nat1, c0)
  rege1logbrege0(c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: fllogbd
blocks.content: A real number is between the base of a logarithm to the power of the floor of the logarithm of the number and the base of the logarithm to the power of the floor of the logarithm of the number plus one. (Contributed by AV, 23-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fllogbd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wbr(co(c0, cexp, c1), cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, co(c0, cexp, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, crp))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cfl, co(c0, clogb, c2)))
} = {
  jca(w0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, c1), cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, co(c0, cexp, co(c1, caddc, nat1))))
  3brtr3d(co(c0, cexp, c1), cle, c2, co(c0, ccxp, c1), co(c0, ccxp, co(c0, clogb, c2)), w0)
  mpbid(w0, wbr(co(c0, ccxp, c1), cle, co(c0, ccxp, co(c0, clogb, c2))), wbr(c1, cle, co(c0, clogb, c2)))
  syl5eqbr(c1, cle, co(c0, clogb, c2), cfv(cfl, co(c0, clogb, c2)), w0)
  syl(w0, wbr(cfv(cfl, co(c0, clogb, c2)), cle, co(c0, clogb, c2)), wcel(co(c0, clogb, c2), cr))
  flle(co(c0, clogb, c2))
  cxpled(c1, co(c0, clogb, c2), c0, w0)
  zred(c1, w0)
  cxpexpzd(c0, c1, w0)
  3brtr3d(c2, clt, co(c0, cexp, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), co(c0, ccxp, co(c0, clogb, c2)), co(c0, ccxp, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), w0)
  mpbid(w0, wbr(co(c0, ccxp, co(c0, clogb, c2)), clt, co(c0, ccxp, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), wbr(co(c0, clogb, c2), clt, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))
  breqtrrd(co(c0, clogb, c2), clt, co(c1, caddc, nat1), co(cfv(cfl, co(c0, clogb, c2)), caddc, nat1), w0)
  syl(w0, wbr(co(c0, clogb, c2), clt, co(cfv(cfl, co(c0, clogb, c2)), caddc, nat1)), wcel(co(c0, clogb, c2), cr))
  flltp1(co(c0, clogb, c2))
  oveq1d(c1, caddc, nat1, cfv(cfl, co(c0, clogb, c2)), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cfl, co(c0, clogb, c2))))
  cxpltd(co(c0, clogb, c2), co(c1, caddc, nat1), c0, w0)
  zred(c0, w0)
  syl(w0, wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wbr(nat1, clt, c0), wcel(c0, cz))
  eluz2b1(c0)
  zred(co(c1, caddc, nat1), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, ccxp, co(c0, clogb, c2)), c2), wcel(c0, cdif(cc, cpr(nat0, nat1))), wcel(c2, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cdif(cc, cpr(nat0, nat1))), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  eluz2cnn0n1(c0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c2, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wcel(c2, crp))
  sylibr(wcel(c2, crp), wcel(c2, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)))
  rpcnne0(c2)
  eldifsn(c2, cc, nat0)
  cxplogb(c0, c2)
  cxpexpzd(c0, co(c1, caddc, nat1), w0)
  zcnd(c0, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  eluzelz(c0, nat2)
  nnne0d(c0, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  eluz2nn(c0)
  peano2zd(c1, w0)
  syl5eqel(c1, cz, cfv(cfl, co(c0, clogb, c2)), w0)
  flcld(co(c0, clogb, c2), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(co(c0, clogb, c2), cr), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c2, crp))
  relogbzcl(c0, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fllogbd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0[^]c1)[≤]c2 ∧ c2[<](c0[^](c1[+]1))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ+)
  ⊣ c1 =(⌊ `(c0[logb]c2))
} = {
  jca(w0, (c0[^]c1)[≤]c2, c2[<](c0[^](c1[+]1)))
  3brtr3d((c0[^]c1), cle, c2, (c0[^c]c1), (c0[^c](c0[logb]c2)), w0)
  mpbid(w0, (c0[^c]c1)[≤](c0[^c](c0[logb]c2)), c1[≤](c0[logb]c2))
  syl5eqbr(c1, cle, (c0[logb]c2), (⌊ `(c0[logb]c2)), w0)
  syl(w0, (⌊ `(c0[logb]c2))[≤](c0[logb]c2), (c0[logb]c2)∈ ℝ)
  flle((c0[logb]c2))
  cxpled(c1, (c0[logb]c2), c0, w0)
  zred(c1, w0)
  cxpexpzd(c0, c1, w0)
  3brtr3d(c2, clt, (c0[^](c1[+]1)), (c0[^c](c0[logb]c2)), (c0[^c](c1[+]1)), w0)
  mpbid(w0, (c0[^c](c0[logb]c2))[<](c0[^c](c1[+]1)), (c0[logb]c2)[<](c1[+]1))
  breqtrrd((c0[logb]c2), clt, (c1[+]1), ((⌊ `(c0[logb]c2))[+]1), w0)
  syl(w0, (c0[logb]c2)[<]((⌊ `(c0[logb]c2))[+]1), (c0[logb]c2)∈ ℝ)
  flltp1((c0[logb]c2))
  oveq1d(c1, caddc, nat1, (⌊ `(c0[logb]c2)), w0)
  a1i(w0, c1 =(⌊ `(c0[logb]c2)))
  cxpltd((c0[logb]c2), (c1[+]1), c0, w0)
  zred(c0, w0)
  syl(w0, 1[<]c0, c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2))
  simprbi(c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2), 1[<]c0, c0 ∈ ℤ)
  eluz2b1(c0)
  zred((c1[+]1), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[^c](c0[logb]c2))= c2, c0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0, 1 }), c2 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 }))
  syl(w0, c0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0, 1 }), c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2))
  eluz2cnn0n1(c0)
  syl(w0, c2 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 }), c2 ∈ ℝ+)
  sylibr(c2 ∈ ℝ+, c2 ∈(ℂ \ { 0 }), (c2 ∈ ℂ ∧ c2 ≠ 0))
  rpcnne0(c2)
  eldifsn(c2, cc, nat0)
  cxplogb(c0, c2)
  cxpexpzd(c0, (c1[+]1), w0)
  zcnd(c0, w0)
  syl(w0, c0 ∈ ℤ, c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2))
  eluzelz(c0, nat2)
  nnne0d(c0, w0)
  syl(w0, c0 ∈ ℕ, c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2))
  eluz2nn(c0)
  peano2zd(c1, w0)
  syl5eqel(c1, cz, (⌊ `(c0[logb]c2)), w0)
  flcld((c0[logb]c2), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[logb]c2)∈ ℝ, c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2), c2 ∈ ℝ+)
  relogbzcl(c0, c2)
}

blocks.name: relogbmulbexp
blocks.content: The logarithm of the product of a positive real number and the base to the power of a real number is the logarithm of the positive real number plus the real number. (Contributed by AV, 29-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm relogbmulbexp(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(crp, csn(nat1))), wa(wcel(c1, crp), wcel(c2, cr))), wceq(co(c0, clogb, co(c1, cmul, co(c0, ccxp, c2))), co(co(c0, clogb, c1), caddc, c2)))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, clogb, co(c1, cmul, co(c0, ccxp, c2))), co(co(c0, clogb, c1), caddc, c2), co(co(c0, clogb, c1), caddc, co(c2, cmul, co(c0, clogb, c0))), wa(wcel(c0, cdif(crp, csn(nat1))), wa(wcel(c1, crp), wcel(c2, cr))))
  syl13anc(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(crp, csn(nat1))), wa(wcel(c1, crp), wcel(c2, cr))), wceq(co(c0, clogb, co(c1, cmul, co(c0, ccxp, c2))), co(co(c0, clogb, c1), caddc, co(c2, cmul, co(c0, clogb, c0)))), wcel(c0, cdif(cc, cpr(nat0, nat1))), wcel(c1, crp), wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c2, cr))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cdif(crp, csn(nat1))), wa(wcel(c1, crp), wcel(c2, cr)), wcel(c0, cdif(cc, cpr(nat0, nat1))))
  3imtr4i(wcel(c0, cdif(crp, csn(nat1))), wcel(c0, cdif(cc, cpr(nat0, nat1))), wa(wcel(c0, crp), wne(c0, nat1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wne(c0, nat1)))
  eldifpr(c0, cc, nat0, nat1)
  simprl(wcel(c0, cdif(crp, csn(nat1))), wcel(c1, crp), wcel(c2, cr))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cdif(crp, csn(nat1))), wa(wcel(c1, crp), wcel(c2, cr)), wcel(c0, crp))
  eldifi(c0, crp, csn(nat1))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cdif(crp, csn(nat1))), wa(wcel(c1, crp), wcel(c2, cr)), wcel(c2, cr))
  simpr(wcel(c1, crp), wcel(c2, cr))
  relogbmulexp(c0, c1, c0, c2)
  oveq2d(co(c0, clogb, c1), caddc, co(c2, cmul, co(c0, clogb, c0)), c2, wa(wcel(c0, cdif(crp, csn(nat1))), wa(wcel(c1, crp), wcel(c2, cr))))
  eqtrd(co(c2, cmul, co(c0, clogb, c0)), c2, co(c2, cmul, nat1), wa(wcel(c0, cdif(crp, csn(nat1))), wa(wcel(c1, crp), wcel(c2, cr))))
  oveq2d(c2, cmul, co(c0, clogb, c0), nat1, wa(wcel(c0, cdif(crp, csn(nat1))), wa(wcel(c1, crp), wcel(c2, cr))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cdif(crp, csn(nat1))), wa(wcel(c1, crp), wcel(c2, cr)), wceq(co(c0, clogb, c0), nat1))
  syl(wcel(c0, cdif(crp, csn(nat1))), wceq(co(c0, clogb, c0), nat1), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wne(c0, nat1)))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cdif(crp, csn(nat1))), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wne(c0, nat1)), wa(wcel(c0, crp), wne(c0, nat1)))
  eldifsn(c0, crp, nat1)
  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, crp), wne(c0, nat1)), wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wne(c0, nat1))
  adantr(wcel(c0, crp), wne(c0, nat1), wcel(c0, cc))
  rpcn(c0)
  adantr(wcel(c0, crp), wne(c0, nat1), wne(c0, nat0))
  rpne0(c0)
  simpr(wcel(c0, crp), wne(c0, nat1))
  logbid1(c0)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cdif(crp, csn(nat1))), wa(wcel(c1, crp), wcel(c2, cr)), wceq(co(c2, cmul, nat1), c2))
  adantl(wcel(c1, crp), wcel(c2, cr), wceq(co(c2, cmul, nat1), c2))
  ax-1rid(c2)
}

blocks.name: relogbdivb
blocks.content: The logarithm of the quotient of a positive real number and the base is the logarithm of the number minus 1. (Contributed by AV, 29-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm relogbdivb(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(crp, csn(nat1))), wcel(c1, crp)), wceq(co(c0, clogb, co(c1, cdiv, c0)), co(co(c0, clogb, c1), cmin, nat1)))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, clogb, co(c1, cdiv, c0)), co(co(c0, clogb, c1), cmin, nat1), co(co(c0, clogb, c1), cmin, co(c0, clogb, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cdif(crp, csn(nat1))), wcel(c1, crp)))
  syl12anc(wa(wcel(c0, cdif(crp, csn(nat1))), wcel(c1, crp)), wceq(co(c0, clogb, co(c1, cdiv, c0)), co(co(c0, clogb, c1), cmin, co(c0, clogb, c0))), wcel(c0, cdif(cc, cpr(nat0, nat1))), wcel(c1, crp), wcel(c0, crp))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cdif(crp, csn(nat1))), wcel(c1, crp), wcel(c0, cdif(cc, cpr(nat0, nat1))))
  sylibr(wcel(c0, cdif(crp, csn(nat1))), wcel(c0, cdif(cc, cpr(nat0, nat1))), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wne(c0, nat1)))
  eldifpr(c0, cc, nat0, nat1)
  simpr(wcel(c0, cdif(crp, csn(nat1))), wcel(c1, crp))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cdif(crp, csn(nat1))), wcel(c1, crp), wcel(c0, crp))
  eldifi(c0, crp, csn(nat1))
  relogbdiv(c0, c1, c0)
  oveq2d(co(c0, clogb, c1), cmin, co(c0, clogb, c0), nat1, wa(wcel(c0, cdif(crp, csn(nat1))), wcel(c1, crp)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cdif(crp, csn(nat1))), wcel(c1, crp), wceq(co(c0, clogb, c0), nat1))
  syl(wcel(c0, cdif(crp, csn(nat1))), wceq(co(c0, clogb, c0), nat1), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wne(c0, nat1)))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cdif(crp, csn(nat1))), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wne(c0, nat1)), wa(wcel(c0, crp), wne(c0, nat1)))
  eldifsn(c0, crp, nat1)
  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, crp), wne(c0, nat1)), wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wne(c0, nat1))
  adantr(wcel(c0, crp), wne(c0, nat1), wcel(c0, cc))
  rpcn(c0)
  adantr(wcel(c0, crp), wne(c0, nat1), wne(c0, nat0))
  rpne0(c0)
  simpr(wcel(c0, crp), wne(c0, nat1))
  logbid1(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm relogbdivb(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(ℝ+ \ { 1 })∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+)→(c0[logb](c1[÷]c0))=((c0[logb]c1)[-]1))
} = {
  eqtrd((c0[logb](c1[÷]c0)), ((c0[logb]c1)[-]1), ((c0[logb]c1)[-](c0[logb]c0)), (c0 ∈(ℝ+ \ { 1 })∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+))
  syl12anc((c0 ∈(ℝ+ \ { 1 })∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+), (c0[logb](c1[÷]c0))=((c0[logb]c1)[-](c0[logb]c0)), c0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0, 1 }), c1 ∈ ℝ+, c0 ∈ ℝ+)
  adantr(c0 ∈(ℝ+ \ { 1 }), c1 ∈ ℝ+, c0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0, 1 }))
  sylibr(c0 ∈(ℝ+ \ { 1 }), c0 ∈(ℂ \ { 0, 1 }), (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c0 ≠ 0 ∧ c0 ≠ 1))
  eldifpr(c0, cc, nat0, nat1)
  simpr(c0 ∈(ℝ+ \ { 1 }), c1 ∈ ℝ+)
  adantr(c0 ∈(ℝ+ \ { 1 }), c1 ∈ ℝ+, c0 ∈ ℝ+)
  eldifi(c0, crp, { 1 })
  relogbdiv(c0, c1, c0)
  oveq2d((c0[logb]c1), cmin, (c0[logb]c0), nat1, (c0 ∈(ℝ+ \ { 1 })∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+))
  adantr(c0 ∈(ℝ+ \ { 1 }), c1 ∈ ℝ+, (c0[logb]c0)= 1)
  syl(c0 ∈(ℝ+ \ { 1 }), (c0[logb]c0)= 1, (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c0 ≠ 0 ∧ c0 ≠ 1))
  sylbi(c0 ∈(ℝ+ \ { 1 }), (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ c0 ≠ 0 ∧ c0 ≠ 1), (c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c0 ≠ 1))
  eldifsn(c0, crp, nat1)
  3jca((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c0 ≠ 1), c0 ∈ ℂ, c0 ≠ 0, c0 ≠ 1)
  adantr(c0 ∈ ℝ+, c0 ≠ 1, c0 ∈ ℂ)
  rpcn(c0)
  adantr(c0 ∈ ℝ+, c0 ≠ 1, c0 ≠ 0)
  rpne0(c0)
  simpr(c0 ∈ ℝ+, c0 ≠ 1)
  logbid1(c0)
}

blocks.name: logbge0b
blocks.content: The logarithm of a number is nonnegative iff the number is greater than or equal to 1. (Contributed by AV, 30-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm logbge0b(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, crp)), wb(wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, clogb, c1)), wbr(nat1, cle, c1)))
} = {
  3bitr2d(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, crp)), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, clogb, c1)), wbr(nat1, cle, c1), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(clog, c1), cdiv, cfv(clog, c0))), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(clog, c1)))
  breq2d(nat0, cle, co(c0, clogb, c1), co(cfv(clog, c1), cdiv, cfv(clog, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, crp)))
  relogbval(c0, c1)
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, crp)), wb(wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(clog, c1)), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(clog, c1), cdiv, cfv(clog, c0)))), wcel(cfv(clog, c1), cr), wcel(cfv(clog, c0), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(clog, c0)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, crp), wcel(cfv(clog, c1), cr))
  relogcl(c1)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, crp), wcel(cfv(clog, c0), cr))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(cfv(clog, c0), cr), wcel(c0, crp))
  relogcl(c0)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, crp), wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(clog, c0)))
  mpbird(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(clog, c0)), wbr(nat1, clt, c0))
  eluz2gt1(c0)
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wb(wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(clog, c0)), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)), wcel(c0, crp))
  nnrpd(c0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  eluz2nn(c0)
  loggt0b(c0)
  ge0div(cfv(clog, c1), cfv(clog, c0))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, crp), wb(wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(clog, c1)), wbr(nat1, cle, c1)))
  logge0b(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm logbge0b(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2)∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+)→(0[≤](c0[logb]c1)↔ 1[≤]c1))
} = {
  3bitr2d((c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2)∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+), 0[≤](c0[logb]c1), 1[≤]c1, 0[≤]((log ` c1)[÷](log ` c0)), 0[≤](log ` c1))
  breq2d(nat0, cle, (c0[logb]c1), ((log ` c1)[÷](log ` c0)), (c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2)∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+))
  relogbval(c0, c1)
  syl3anc((c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2)∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+), (0[≤](log ` c1)↔ 0[≤]((log ` c1)[÷](log ` c0))), (log ` c1)∈ ℝ, (log ` c0)∈ ℝ, 0[<](log ` c0))
  adantl(c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2), c1 ∈ ℝ+, (log ` c1)∈ ℝ)
  relogcl(c1)
  adantr(c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2), c1 ∈ ℝ+, (log ` c0)∈ ℝ)
  syl(c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2), (log ` c0)∈ ℝ, c0 ∈ ℝ+)
  relogcl(c0)
  adantr(c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2), c1 ∈ ℝ+, 0[<](log ` c0))
  mpbird(c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2), 0[<](log ` c0), 1[<]c0)
  eluz2gt1(c0)
  syl(c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2), (0[<](log ` c0)↔ 1[<]c0), c0 ∈ ℝ+)
  nnrpd(c0, c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2))
  eluz2nn(c0)
  loggt0b(c0)
  ge0div((log ` c1), (log ` c0))
  adantl(c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2), c1 ∈ ℝ+, (0[≤](log ` c1)↔ 1[≤]c1))
  logge0b(c1)
}

blocks.name: logblt1b
blocks.content: The logarithm of a number is less than 1 iff the number is less than the base of the logarithm. (Contributed by AV, 30-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm logblt1b(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, crp)), wb(wbr(co(c0, clogb, c1), clt, nat1), wbr(c1, clt, c0)))
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, crp)), wbr(co(c0, clogb, c1), clt, nat1), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(co(cfv(clog, c1), cdiv, cfv(clog, c0)), clt, nat1))
  breq1d(co(c0, clogb, c1), clt, nat1, co(cfv(clog, c1), cdiv, cfv(clog, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, crp)))
  relogbval(c0, c1)
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, crp)), wbr(co(cfv(clog, c1), cdiv, cfv(clog, c0)), clt, nat1), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(cfv(clog, c1), clt, co(cfv(clog, c0), cmul, nat1)))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, crp)), wb(wbr(co(cfv(clog, c1), cdiv, cfv(clog, c0)), clt, nat1), wbr(cfv(clog, c1), clt, co(cfv(clog, c0), cmul, nat1))), wcel(cfv(clog, c1), cr), wcel(nat1, cr), wa(wcel(cfv(clog, c0), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(clog, c0))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, crp), wcel(cfv(clog, c1), cr))
  relogcl(c1)
  1red(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, crp)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, crp), wa(wcel(cfv(clog, c0), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(clog, c0))))
  jca(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(cfv(clog, c0), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(clog, c0)))
  mpbird(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(clog, c0)), wbr(nat1, clt, c0))
  eluz2gt1(c0)
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wb(wbr(nat0, clt, cfv(clog, c0)), wbr(nat1, clt, c0)), wcel(c0, crp))
  loggt0b(c0)
  ltdivmul(cfv(clog, c1), nat1, cfv(clog, c0))
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, crp)), wbr(cfv(clog, c1), clt, co(cfv(clog, c0), cmul, nat1)), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(cfv(clog, c1), clt, cfv(clog, c0)))
  breq2d(cfv(clog, c1), clt, co(cfv(clog, c0), cmul, nat1), cfv(clog, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, crp)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, crp), wceq(co(cfv(clog, c0), cmul, nat1), cfv(clog, c0)))
  mulid1d(cfv(clog, c0), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  recnd(cfv(clog, c0), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(cfv(clog, c0), cr), wcel(c0, crp))
  relogcl(c0)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, crp)), wb(wbr(cfv(clog, c1), clt, cfv(clog, c0)), wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, crp), wcel(c0, crp)))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c1, crp), wa(wcel(c1, crp), wcel(c0, crp)))
  anim2i(wcel(c1, crp), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(c0, crp))
  nnrpd(c0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  eluz2nn(c0)
  bicomd(wa(wcel(c1, crp), wcel(c0, crp)), wbr(cfv(clog, c1), clt, cfv(clog, c0)), wbr(c1, clt, c0))
  logltb(c1, c0)
}
